topic.title: EMS Injury Incident Description Section - conformance rules

lines.i: Observations concerning a patient's injury mechanism

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.17"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67800-3" EMS injury incident description Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10094)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "Injury Incident Description Section" (CONF:10914)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10916)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10917)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury Cause Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.50)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10919)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury Mechanism (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.51)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10921)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Trauma Center Criteria (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.52)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:10923)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury Risk Factor (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.53)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10925)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vehicle Impact Area (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.54)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10927)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Location In Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.55)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10929)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vehicle Occupant Safety Equipment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.56)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10931)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Airbag Deployment Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.57)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10933)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Height Of Fall (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.58)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10935)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Disaster Type (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.59)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67800-3" EMS injury incident description Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10094)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "Injury Incident Description Section" (CONF:10914)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10916)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10917)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury Cause Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.50)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10919)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury Mechanism (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.51)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10921)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Trauma Center Criteria (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.52)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:10923)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury Risk Factor (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.53)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10925)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vehicle Impact Area (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.54)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10927)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Location In Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.55)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10929)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vehicle Occupant Safety Equipment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.56)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10931)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Airbag Deployment Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.57)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10933)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Height Of Fall (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.58)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10935)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Disaster Type (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.59)
